## CompanyField type

All company work fields.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type CompanyField =
  | "software"
  | "software consultant"
  | "it"
  | "security engineer"
  | "network engineer"
  | "business"
  | "business consultant"
  | "security"
  | "agent"
  | "employee"
  | "part-time employee"
  | "waiter"
  | "part-time waiter";
```
